Literature.Author: Hocquellet A, Odaert B, Cabanne C, Noubhani A, Dieryck W, Joucla G, Le Senechal C, Milenkov M, Chaignepain S, Schmitter JM, Claverol S, Santarelli X, Dufourc EJ, Bonneu M, Garbay B, Costaglioli P
